lead_paragraph: In other reports, construction spending edged up in September while personal spending rose 0.2 percent. Personal income, however, fell 0.1 percent.
snippet: In other reports, construction spending edged up in September while personal spending rose 0.2 percent. Personal income, however, fell 0.1 percent.

headline.main: Crucial Manufacturing Index Strengthens in October
headline.seo: I.S.M. Index, Crucial Manufacturing Sign, Strengthened in October
headline.print_headline: Crucial Manufacturing Index Strengthens in October
